Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars - Saga
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

::: With a moan, Hell Beast's body fell onto the table. Jackle swung around, 
pistol in hand, and began firing at Killer. He only got two random shots off 
before Set fired a blast into his shoulder, sending him sprawling to the 
floor. :::

::: Set ::: They will live. Im glad you were there, Killer. If you werent, I 
might have had a problem.

::: He glances at the two fallen bots. :::

::: Set ::: Place them in a holding cell. I will contact there base and tel 
lthem we are holding them hostage. Prehaps we can get some much needed 
equitment from them.

::: He leaves the room only to be his by a smoking drone. It hists him and 
hits the floor. :::

::: Set ::: What the hell is this now?

::: Megatron ::: I am Megatr-

::: the drone goes offline. :::

::: Set ::: Megatron?! Imagine that....

::: He pickes up the bot and goes into a storage room. Two other bots were in 
there cleaning. :::

::: Set ::: You two, do we have any protforms or and blanks?

::: Bot ::: I do belive we have four remaining.

::: Set ::: Four?! Out of-

::: He shook his head ::: Very well. Transfer the spark of this drone into a 
protoform, now.

::: The bots did as they were told. In a moment or two, Megatron raised out 
of the coffin like stasis pod in a blank protoform. :::

::: Megatron ::: By the pit! Its about time.

::: Set ::: You dont look like Megatron....

::: Megatron ::: Give me the transmetal 2 tech box and I will fix that.

::: Set ::: And I should help you because...?

::: Megatron ::: We both want to see the Maximals, Allience, and Predacons 
dead. We can work togrether, in a coalalition.

::: Set smiles ::: Riiight. A coalition.

::: Megatron ::: Well?

::: Set ::: Ill see what I can do. For now, you wil lremain in a holding cell.

::: Megatron ::: What? You can do tha-

::: Set left the room, with Megatron cursing at the two bots who were going 
to put him in his cage. In a protoform he was still defenseless. And what 
about the tech box? Transmetal 2? Interesting....it required a bit of 
reasearch, but Set would have it, and with it he would control Megatron. :::

~~~~~~~~~~

::: Pheniox ::: There is still no word from Hell Beast. Rampage, Inferno, and 
Tankkor have been gone forever...and Rattrap along with Transanulas are still 
in our custody.

::: Black Aracnia ::: Well, Gremlin is still here.

::: Pheniox shot back ::: Thats comfortimg.

::: Black Aracnia ::: So, should we take command?

::: Pheniox ::: I see no other option at the moment. And i was the general of 
the largest anti-maximla resistance group ever...

::: Black Aracnia ::: Then by all means, lead us.

::: Pheniox took to the command chair :::

::: On a Predacon Transmission she said ::: All Predacons. Please report. I 
have taken command for the moment. Commander Hell Beast is missing, belived 
to be at the newly crashed ship. I reccomend all  Predacons withdraw from 
there current missions and attempt to take control of the new ship. Please 
respond at once.
